Text: For all of you who are on here looking for movies....do not follow any link that promises you a site where you can watch the latest movies for free.....they make you fill out a survey (which in turn will overflow you with spam) then they say your video player needs its latest update....as soon as you click yes you are downloading a herpes like virus (when you try and run virus removers or delete associated files....up pops the Blue Screen of death).  Please use common sense and try to keep your downloads to trusted TPB users.

I have no complaints with video or audio quality, and I can be picky at times. The movie is geared a little bit to a young/middle age generation, and be advised that if you do not like to here the "F_ word" about every 20 seconds for an entire movie, then this movie may not be for you. The cussing did not bother me, but I know lots of people that would find this movie funny but would not watch it due to all of the swearing. It will be interesting to see a cleaned up version for broadcast TV.
